backend/main.mo: Defines the main actor with storage/auth mixins, system health APIs, user profiles, and Binance account management.
backend/migration.mo: Migrates old user profiles to the new format by adding default tradingStatus while preserving other stored data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files across auth, layout, datasets, prompts, metrics, and trading.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens defining light and dark theme variables for the app.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app configuring routes, layout, authentication gating, initialization, and feature pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Landing/login gate that shows marketing features and triggers Internet Identity login.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for initial user profile creation with name, email, and default trading settings.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main application layout with sidebar navigation, trading sections, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/system/AppInitGa: App initialization wrapper that handles loading, backend connection errors, and sign‑out.
frontend/src/components/system/AsyncStat: Utility component to render loading, error, empty, or content states for async data.
frontend/src/components/system/HealthSta: Displays system health warnings or errors with a refetch option.
frontend/src/components/system/RouteErro: Full‑screen error boundary for route failures with reload and home navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/trading/BinanceC: Manages connecting, verifying, and disconnecting a user's Binance API credentials.
frontend/src/components/trading/LiveTrad: Confirmation dialog requiring a specific phrase before enabling live trading, handling confirm/cancel and pending state.
frontend/src/components/trading/TradingM: Displays a banner showing the user's current trading mode with icon, label, and description.
Select input for switching trading modes with a special confirmation flow for enabling live trading.
frontend/src/features/backtests/Backtest: Static UI showing planned backtest configuration sections and notes that backend storage is not implemented.
Placeholder UI for displaying backtest results and metrics, indicating backend support is not yet available.
frontend/src/features/backtests/RunBackt: Static page describing future backtest execution functionality and showing a placeholder execution card.
frontend/src/features/datasets/datasetPa: Parses CSV or JSON files into Candle objects with validation and timestamp normalization.
frontend/src/features/datasets/DatasetsP: Dataset management UI allowing listing and uploading datasets with file parsing and async upload handling.
frontend/src/features/episodes/EpisodeRe: Static UI for reviewing flagged episodes with placeholder alert and empty state. Backend episode logging is not yet implemented.
frontend/src/features/metrics/MetricsPag: Metrics dashboard UI with placeholders for performance indicators and backend-dependent data. Provides static cards and descriptions for future metrics.
frontend/src/features/prompts/PromptLibr: Prompt template management page with create dialog, seed loading, and save/copy actions. Uses backend queries to load and store templates.
frontend/src/features/prompts/promptSeed: Defines default prompt templates for analysis, reward tuning, and orchestration. Each seed includes id, metadata, content, and example JSON I/O.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingHis: Trade history viewer with filters and mock trade data. Computes filtered results and total PnL for display.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingOrd: Order placement and management UI with mock open orders and form validation. Supports paper, shadow, and live trading modes with toast feedback.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingPor: Displays a portfolio overview with mock balance, P&L, and open positions using cards and AsyncState.
frontend/src/features/trading/TradingSaf: Provides kill switch and risk limit controls for trading safety with UI inputs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorStatus.ts: Exposes actor loading state and a retry mechanism for reinitializing the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity login, state management, and provider for loading and storing user identities.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind-based theme variables for light/dark modes and finance dashboard styling.
frontend/src/lib/queries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for backend data such as profiles, datasets, prompts, and health checks with timeout handling.
frontend/src/lib/queryUtils.ts: Offers utility helpers for query timeouts and error normalization.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), store them in sessionStorage, retrieve them with persistence, and clear them from session or the hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration including dark mode, content paths, theme extensions, custom colors, typography, container settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s overall goals, architecture, issues, and feature versions for evolving a research dashboard into a production trading system.
